title: Jewels of the South America!

The world’s fourth largest continent, South America boasts of a large number of attractions, festivals and natural wonders that can steal your heart away. Its historical past has made it a culturally rich place that has numerous museums, monuments, buildings and ancient ruins. Many religious sites, natural areas, islands and UNESCO world heritage are also a part of the continent that make it a gem on the map of the world. But, the actual gems of South America are its cities and several places, who have managed to gain more fame than the continent itself. So, while you plan a vacation to this alluring spot, take a look at the top places that you should visit on your next trip to know the place to its core. Argentina: Argentina is a nation in the South America, which is famous for its mountains, glacial lakes, pampas grasslands and its elite national soccer team. It is a famous tourist destination which is loaded with cultural heritage and attractions that will make you wonder in surprise. Also known as the Paris of the south, Argentina is a diverse place with many outdoor cafes, wine regions and much more. The top attractions of Argentina include, Iguazu Falls, Los Glacier National Park, Plaza de Mayo, etc. Brazil: This dazzling nation is the heartthrob of the South America and known to be one of the world’s best tourist destinations. The pristine beaches, natural wildlife and football are the major reasons that make it so popular worldwide. But while you are thinking that these are only the things, then, its worth mentioning that the country serves a large number of tourists throughout the year. The attractions like the Sugarloaf Mountain, Corcovado, Christ the Redeemer, Ipanema, etc. are the few of the other reasons that you should consider while visiting it. Chile: Yet another gem of the South America, Chile is a country which is situated on the Pacific Ocean coastline. It has a diverse culture and a blend of adventure and natural wonders that are worth visiting. The volcanic peaks, lake districts and wildlife parks make it an ideal destination to spend your vacation at. Torres del National Park, San Cristobal Hill, Chiloe Island, Santa Lucia Hill, San Rafael Glacier, etc. are the top hot spots that shall be visited while you are here. Rio de Janerio: This seaside city is located in Brazil, which has an exotic range of beaches, lush mountains, and a large number of shanty towns. Samba dance is also associated with the city and there are a number of dance bars that boast flamboyant costumes and vibrant nightlife. A trip to South America can never be complete without exploring Rio de Janerio. Copacabana, Ipanema, Santa Teresa, etc. are the major spots to visit. Need to know more? Book a cheap flight to Rio de Janerio and lose yourself to the charm of this marvelous destination. 
There is a lot more to see and enjoy, all you need to do is keep calm and explore them all! Source:   ABOUT THE AUTHOR
